message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but I'm looking to get a bit more for the product than your offer. Would you be willing to meet at $16,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still not able to exceed $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly come closer to my budget?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference from my previous offer and land at $14,000?
I appreciate your effort, Alice. I'm still looking to stay within my budget of $12,000. Would you consider meeting me halfway between our last two offers?
